EmailTemplate.name: Pre-VMworld EU inhouse mailing.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Complimentary Downloads: Drive Down the Cost of Virtualisation Control
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Welcome to virtualisation paradise, where you can relax with the peace of mind that your workloads are being managed efficiently and your virtual data centre is under control.
As you prepare for VMworld 2013 Barcelona — and even if you are not planning to attend - we’re excited to offer you this complimentary ParadisePack <http://bit.ly/16xSxdh>, which contains the essentials for learning about a new approach to managing your virtual infrastructure that will allow you to ride the wave of data centre control.
Best Regards, VMTurbo Team
Headed to VMworld 2013? Come visit us at Booth #B412
VMTurbo was named a CRN Emerging Vendor <http://bit.ly/17E5wvN> for 2013.
